ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 167
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/11/99 9:36:16 AM Eastern Standard Time, rosemg@erols.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/11/99 9:36:16 AM Eastern Standard Time,
rosemg@... writes:

<< And could you please tell me the best way to get there
from West Karanas. I have died more times than I want
to say trying to get there. I have hugged the coast but
every time I get to North Karanas Radiers near the coast
kill me. >>

You can easily get to East Karana by hugging the coast and then simply go
around the raiders and then back to the coast. Just run along the high ridge
near the raiders and then when you are past - get back to the water.

To be even safer. Stop at the Wizard Spires at the first stone bridge and
get either a sow or Invisibility or even both.

Wizaro Wrathcaster

From the Offices of: Florida PIRG
Advocate for the Public Interest
